physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Recurrent fever, oral and genital ulcers, positive pathergy test, anemia, elevated erythrocyte sedimentation rate and C-reactive protein level.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: After starting anakinra (100 mg/d), there was a dramatic remission in fever and marked improvement in oral and genital ulcers within 7 to 10 days, with culture of blood and sputum negative.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Significant reduction in fever and improvement in oral and genital ulcers with escalated anakinra dosage.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: When anakinra was reduced to alternate days, oral ulcers and fever reappeared but resolved upon returning to daily dosing.
